If your patio region isn't going to include a full cover go over then very carefully pick desk tops and table bases that are durable ample to deal with the rigors of outside use.

Relying on the concept of your eatery or bar you will most probably want to keep on the motif on the patio. In addition to getting very sturdy solid iron and wood desk bases are UV and drinking water resistant so you will not have to fear about commercial desk bases currently being left external during the afternoon or a mild rainfall.
